item.title: Revisting My Workflow! üìì
item.description: What was I doing before? What happened in 2019 & 2020? Setting Up Boundaries in Our (Remote) World Finding Time to Build Myself Up What was I doing before? Back in 2019, I adopted a series of steps that helped to drive what I was working on. Each project began with the same boilerplate mental checklist. It began with inspiration and ideation stages that helped to set the stage for where things should go.

item.title: Looking Back: A Bi-Annual Review

And shortly after, I got my wish. ‚≠ê
